folder: Hopping Avenue & Patten Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
76 Hopping Avenue, west of the S.W. corner of Patten Street, showing part of the rear of the Edward M. Hansen residence and a rose arbor straddling the driveway. The view is toward the avenue.

July 2, 1927.

P.L. Sperr

folder: Hopping Avenue & Patten Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)

76 Hopping Avenue, west of the S.W. corner of Patten Street, showing the rear of the Edward M. Hansen residence.

P.L. Sperr

July 2, 1927.

(2)

A close view of the rose arbor in the rear of the house. The house, on the left, is number 82 Hopping Avenue.

P.L. Sperr

July 2, 1927.

(3)

The garage and rose bushes in rear of the Hansen residence.

P.L. Sperr

July 2, 1927.
